Description_lang: Causes Fire damage when hit, increases your chance to critically hit with spells by $s3%, and reduces the chance you are critically hit by $s2%.  Only one type of Armor spell can be active at any time.  Lasts $d.
AuraDescription_lang: Causes Fire damage to attackers.  Chance to receive a critical hit reduced by $s2%.  Chance to critically strike with spells increased by $s3%.
